name: Lauren Archer
body:
### About

Hello! My name is Lauren and I like a lot of things.

I'm a heritage policy wonk and a board member at [Site3](http://site3.ca/) (a Toronto hackerspace). I'm into melting things, applied physics, self-directed learning, maps and open data. I design and make [eyewear](http://www.wornjournal.com/blog/four-eyes-2/), and I once [blew up Ryan North.](http://www.wired.com/design/2013/02/ryan-north-kickstarted-head-pop/)

Here you will mostly find my data analysis and visualization projects, though.

### Projects

[Toronto Waste Calendars](http://laurenarcher.github.io/iCalTOWaste/)

[Visualize Your Twitter Archive](http://laurenarcher.github.io/twitter-archive-analysis/)

[Visualizations of the Toronto Casino Public Feedback Data] (http://laurenarcher.github.io/CasinoSurveyVis/)

###Contact Me

The best way to contact me is [@laurenarcher](https://twitter.com/laurenarcher) but I guess you can also find me on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=197911145).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
